subject: Revisiting a potential SIMSONN collaboration
description_text:
Dear SIMSONN Team,

I hope you’ve been well.

I reached out earlier this year regarding a potential collaboration, and I
wanted to reconnect as SIMHUBREADYUK has grown significantly since then.
Over the past months, my short-form sim racing content across Instagram and
Facebook has been consistently reaching 10k–100k+ views per reel, with
multiple videos reaching hundreds of thousands and beyond.

My content focuses on immersive POV racing, real-world hardware usage, and
high-retention reels that perform well with cold audiences. I’ve since
begun working with sim racing brands through organic integrations and
affiliate partnerships, and I believe SIMSONN’s Pro Plus Pedals would be a
perfect fit for my audience and content style.

Here are my platforms for reference:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/simhubreadyuk
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/simhubreadyuk

If this is something you’d still be open to exploring, I’d love to discuss
how we could showcase the Pro Plus Pedals through authentic,
performance-driven content that aligns with SIMSONN’s premium positioning.

Thanks again for your time, and I’d be happy to answer any questions.

Best regards,
Cody Blell
Founder – SIMHUBREADYUK

conversations.body_text: I’ve attached a couple of recent insight snapshots for context.
the facebook link was not correct. Here is the new one.        https://www.facebook.com/share/1KMWapNBWv/?mibextid=wwXIfr
